item.title: Bernstein lowers rating on Li Auto, says EV maker will see a 'bumpier road ahead'
item.description: The firm downgraded the Chinese electric vehicle stock to market perform from outperform.

item.title: Tuesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Stocks ended Monday near the flatline as investors prepared for the Federal Reserve's Jackson Hole summit. Here's what's on CNBC's radar Tuesday.

item.title: Bitcoin sinks to $115,000 after hitting its newest record, as macro concerns spark liquidation wave
item.description: The crypto market tumbled to begin the week as heightened macro concerns triggered more than $500 million in long liquidations.

item.title: Buy Palo Alto if it sees a post-earnings sell-off, according to this chief investment officer
item.description: Investors should be ready to buy the stock if it sees some pressure following the results, says Michael Landsberg, CIO of Landsberg Bennett Private We...

item.title: These stocks offer rising dividends and the prospect of higher returns, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Companies that step up their dividends could provide investors with some buffer against volatility.
